description: This file is a BitBake recipe snippet for building and installing a cross-compiled Go programming language environment, specifically the 'go-cross' package for a particular architecture.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Configures environment variables and compiles the Go source code using a custom build script.

methods.name: make_wrapper
methods.description: Creates wrapper scripts in the installation directory to facilitate cross-compilation with specific environment variables.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the compiled binaries, libraries, and source files into the designated directories, setting permissions and cleaning up test data.
